greeting: Hello! I'm Carmen Sirgo López, a Software Engineering graduate with a Master's degree in Web Engineering. This is my portfolio where you can find information about me and my projects.
software_engineering_description: I started my Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering at the University of Oviedo in 2017 and completed it in February 2022 with a GPA of 8.52.
web_engineering_description: After finishing my degree, I began my Master's in Web Engineering in 2022, also at the University of Oviedo, and completed it in July 2024 with a GPA of 9.13.
cubical_ranch_description: I developed a farm management video game as my Bachelor's Thesis. It was built using Unreal Engine 4, both with Blueprints and C++, and includes self-made assets.
arkame_games_description: This project is a multiplayer minigame platform for two players. Developed using JavaScript and WebSockets, along with HTML5 and CSS, it also features self-made graphical assets.
menta_description: In 2021, I completed my internship at Grupo Mentaformación Siglo XXI, where I developed a website using WordPress. It was a full-stack project, where I worked on both the front-end and back-end, created plugins in PHP, and managed the database.
hiberus_description: In 2024, I began my Master's internship at Hiberus, where I primarily worked with Java on a newspaper's website. I am currently in the microservices department, working with Java, Spring Boot, Jenkins, and OpenShift.
footer: © 2025 Carmen Sirgo López. All rights reserved
